name: Guilty Red - REBirth
description:
A short emotional journey as a former hitokiri (literally "Man Cutter") tries to make amends with her past. Can her soul be reborn? Can she save the woman she loves? - Made for the IGMC 2022 entry in RPGMaker MZ

  • No maps, node-based exploration so you can get in on the action! 
  • Beautiful, fully animated battlers courtesy of Aeskashics! 
  • Sleek, custom main menus. no fuss no hassle! 
  •  Unleash the inner Soul Urges of various weapons! 
  • Want to grind for the best gear but feels its too tedious? No problem! A lightning fast auto-battle system that lets you choose between Attack or Skills and even lets you set how fast you want it to go! 
  •   Engage in battle for Rina's soul as you fight through hordes of Endwalkers. You will not get a Game Over if the party is wiped out! [since Rina is well, technically dead]
